name: user-management-system
description: User Management System with Angular Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm install concurrently pm2 --legacy-peer-deps && cd backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && (if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules) && (if exist package-lock.json del /f /q package-lock.json) && (if exist .angular\cache rmdir /s /q .angular\cache)
scripts.build:frontend: npm run clean:frontend && cd frontend && npm cache clean --force && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build -- --configuration production
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend
